rows.label: qev086103_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ngogo hear that friend is collecting Nopon cooking
recipes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0002
rows.name:
Then friend definitely needs to look at traditional royal
cuisine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0003
rows.name:
Recipe has been passed down from house of elder to
house of elder. It involve many special rules and rites.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev086103_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ngogo about the rules and rites.

rows.label: qev086103_JNK0020
rows.name: Press

rows.label: qev086103_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Ngogo that you are here for a recipe, not a lecture.

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0004
rows.name: Curious friend is very sensible, for human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0005
rows.name:
First, chef must purify themselves in waters of waterfall.
One like King's Falls is best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0006
rows.name:
Then chef must fling themselves off highest point!
This is symbol of courage needed to put food before
venerable elder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0007
rows.name:
Next, they... Wait, friend is interested in hearing more,
yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_JNK0030
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev086103_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Ngogo to continue his explanation.

rows.label: qev086103_JNK0040
rows.name: Stop

rows.label: qev086103_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Ngogo to just give you the recipe already.

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0008
rows.name:
Next, to heighten focus, chef must carve portrait onto
single white bean, then color it with various spices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0009
rows.name:
And since laughter is best appetizer, chef must then
tell one hundred original knock-knock jokes to elder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0010
rows.name: After meal is eaten, Nopon girls lick plates clean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0011
rows.name:
...Er, last part was added by current elder,
but it too gross and trashy for anyone to bother with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0012
rows.name:
Anyway, rules are such rump-pain that no one ever
wants to be royal chef.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0013
rows.name:
Take look at recipe though.
If interested, friend can probably have job![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0014
rows.name:
Though no one would be sad if tradition just died.
Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0015
rows.name: Good call. Friend is wise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0016
rows.name:
Take look at recipe. If interested, friend can probably
have job of royal chef![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0017
rows.name:
Though no one would be sad if tradition just died.
Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086103_MSG0018
rows.name:
Ngogo just wanted someone to talk to for little while.
Ngogo been dealing with Elder Nan for so long...[ST:wait ]
